name: Prin-Simple [GameJam Edition]
description:
Credits to Toby Fox [Creator of Undertale] for some assets.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You're the principal of a primary school and there's a concert going on.

A lot of students wanna go there, so they act like they're sick.

Determine which students are actually sick and send them home, but send the fakers back to class.

If you don't send a sick kid home, they'll vomit and you'll have to pay clean up costs.

If you send a faker home, you'll pay for letting them miss classes their parents paid for.

If the kids have permission you can send them home.

There's a few easter eggs here and there. Can you find them all?

This is the first GameJam i've ever did so it won't be great.

Comment down below what you want in this game and your opinion.

P.S. The Theme "Escape From School" is interpreted in the way that the kids wanna escape school to the concert so not literal.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dev Team: JokyTheJoker [Programmer, SFX, Music], The Videogame Wolf [Graphical Artist], Tamasgaming [Beta-Tester].

Made with Gamemaker Studio 2

Made for Weekly GameJam 99

This game is incomplete and there might be bugs. There's no real challenge in the game as of now so sorry about that.
